Subject: Baffled
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=220898870

Hi Guys,

I want to use Heritrix to crawl google search results and harvest the
URLs, these URLs are then going to be put into a directory as in a
listing. So for example you go to this directory site and you say well
let me see what computer companies are out there and then you click on
comptuers and u get a list of all the comp stores out there etc. Then
as a user u get to review them etc. The problem is everytime I put in
a seed url such as:

http://www.google.ie/search?q=web+design&sourceid=mozilla-search&start=0&start=0&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&client=firefox-a&rls=org.mozilla:en-US:official

It wont start, well thats not true its starts and finishes but
thereare no statistics all which suggests to me that it simply isnt
starting. The wierd thing is that if I use any domain as a
seed URL will work fine. I would really really appreciate someone
explaining to me why this is happening. I cant find any refference in
the documentation and Im at my wits end.

Oh and this is all being done through the Web User Interface because
its a very simple thing Im looking for.

Dave
